Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory180.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Guard', 3: 'Report. We drove those Babylonians out of the security area.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Guard', 3: "But they're not showing signs of backing down. The monitoring device suggests that they're even planning to make camp in the outer part of the city.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Guard', 3: 'Lady Qu, should we launch another attack?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "That won't be necessary. They're only here to defend against the Ascendants.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Guard', 3: 'So are we going to join forces with them?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "I don't see them as our ally. We'll deal with them when the time is right.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Guard', 3: 'Understood. So they, too, will be our enemy—is that what I should tell the others?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Yes, and be quick about moving the artifacts and the other exhibits. Speed up the database relocation to the core facility within the walls.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Guard', 3: "We're already on it, Lady Qu.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Now that all major factions have gathered here... we need a change of plans.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory178.png'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Ascendants quietly set foot in the city, but the area they find themselves in has long been abandoned by Kowloong.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "Clingers to the old world, they are. They've been preserving not only local artifacts, but also museum relics from other cultures, or so I've heard?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Mm-hmm... Never saw the point of that, though.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'The value of a collection is defined by the collector. Outsider eyes and words matter not.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'Is that one of the lines in that book of yours, Gabriel?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Yes, Miss Luna.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: "You'd have to lend that book to me someday.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Corrupted slowly make their way through the opening and gather behind the Ascendants—praying, worshipping, waiting.'}
{3: 'They know not what is to befall. They know only that they follow orders.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: 'Quite pitiful numbers, but, sufficient, hm?', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Alpha turns her gaze to Roland, then to Gabriel and Lamia. They reach a mutual agreement.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Gabriel and I will stay together. Lamia, you do what you do best and find a way inside the city.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: 'H-huh...? I-I have to be on my own?! M-Miss Luna...!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The idea of going solo seems to have frightened Lamia, but Luna only answers her plea of help with a gentle smile.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: "That's settled then. Take your fleet of Corrupted and move out.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Luna is gazing into the distance. Alpha commands the other three in her place.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Tourism! How exciting.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Miss Luna, do wait for my good news.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Aw... sniff... I-I need a manual for how to work with these people...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The three leave with the Corrupted, and silence takes over. Luna nudges toward Alpha.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'Sister, just for, a little longer, like this...', 4: '2'}
{1: '2', 2: 'α', 3: 'As long as you want.', 4: '1'}
